title: How to View Your TikTok Following Feed: Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Open the TikTok app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. By default, the app will open on the For You Page. If you're using a computer, you can also access TikTok in your web browser .

steps.title: Tap the Following button at the top of the page.
steps.content: Tap the Following button at the top of the page. This will open a feed of videos posted only by people that you follow. You can swap back and forth between your Following Feed and For You Page at any time by tapping For You at the top of the screen to move back to the FYP.

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. If you want to see a list of everyone you follow, you can do so easily in the TikTok app.

steps.title: Click the profile icon in the bottom right corner .
steps.content: Click the profile icon in the bottom right corner . This will pull up your user profile .

steps.title: Tap the word Following under your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap the word Following under your profile picture. The app will display all the people you follow. If you follow someone and they follow you back, you'll be listed as Friends on this page.

steps.title: Yes, other TikTok users can see who you follow.
steps.content: Yes, other TikTok users can see who you follow. There are two ways you can make your following list private, however: On your profile, tap the menu â˜° button in the right hand corner and select Settings and privacy . Select Privacy . If you scroll down and tap Following list , you can change who can view your following list. [1] X Research source Alternatively you can make your entire account private by toggling Private account in the Privacy menu.

steps.title: Find a TikTok user you'd like to follow.
steps.content: Find a TikTok user you'd like to follow. There are many ways to find people on TikTok: By watching their TikTok on your For You Page On a friend's following or follower list Via follower suggestions in your inbox

steps.title: Tap the red Follow button.
steps.content: Tap the red Follow button. You can follow directly from someone's profile, your inbox, or someone else's followers or following list. You can also follow directly from a TikTok by pressing the red + button under their profile picture. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Unfollow someone by tapping Unfollow.
steps.content: Unfollow someone by tapping Unfollow . After you follow someone, the follow button will turn into a gray Unfollow button. Tapping this button will remove you from that user's followers.
